task.title: How to set up a child seat
task.shortdesc: This task describes the process of installing a child's seat in your new Mini.

step.cmd: Place the child seat on the rear left seat in the car.

substep.cmd: Position the child seat with the headrest nearest to the back of the left passenger seat.
Jiggle the car seat to ensure it is firmly situated in the back seat of the car.
